title: 站会同步进度
situation: Daily standup. Your manager asks about your progress.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.pinyin: Nǐ zhè biān jìndù zěnme yàng?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 设计稿已经评审完了，等开发排期。
turns.pinyin: Shèjì gǎo yǐjīng píngshěn wán le, děng kāifā páiqī.
turns.translation: Design review is done, waiting for dev to schedule.
suggestions: 设计稿已经评审完了，等开发排期。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 开发预计什么时候能开始？
turns.pinyin: Kāifā yùjì shénme shíhou néng kāishǐ?
turns.translation: When does dev expect to start?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 这週五能排进来，下週一开始开发。
turns.pinyin: Zhè zhōuwǔ néng pái jìnlái, xià zhōuyī kāishǐ kāifā.
turns.translation: Should be scheduled this Friday, development starts next Monday.
suggestions: 这週五能排进来，下週一开始开发。
